Events.Name: Story_Start
Events.Description: This is the beginning of the mission

Option_A.Name: Choice_1
Option_A.Description: This is the first choice pointing to the next story node. This chance has both positive (which lower chances of failure) and negative chances (which increase chances of failure).

Option_B.Name: Choice_2
Option_B.Description: This is the second choice pointing to the next story node. The chance has no positive modifiers, only negative ones.

Option_C.Name: Choice_3
Option_C.Description: This is the third choice pointing to the next story node. The failure chance is zero as choosing this option absolutely succeeds.

Events.Name: Story_Fail
Events.Description: This is a failure node that still allows for branching paths before exiting the program. It still allows for decisions.

Events.Name: Story_Absolute_Fail
Events.Description: This is an absolute fail, where the team gets wiped out
